data.message: Welcome  Mr. President  Obama  I would  like  to  thank  you  for  all  the  good  work  that  you  have  done  for  our  country  I know  that  it was  hard  with  everyone  fighting  against  you  but  God  was  there  with  you  every  step  of  the  way  ashe these days  or and weeks is counting  down  I pray  that  you  and  your  beautiful  family will  be  bless  with  lots  of  love  peace  and  happiness  for  the  rest  of  your  life
